meanings.sent1: The snow-covered landscape looked very winterly.
meanings.sent2: The cold wind made everything feel winterly.
meanings.sent3: The winterly scene outside made the children excited to build a snowman.
meanings.sent4: Her icy stare was as winterly as the frozen lake.
meanings.sent5: The winterly chill in the air made her shiver uncontrollably.

meanings.sent1: The winterly storm brought heavy snowfall.
meanings.sent2: The winterly holidays are a time for family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The winterly flu season always seems to hit the office hard.
meanings.sent4: The winterly silence of the forest was broken by a distant howl.
meanings.sent5: The winterly nights seemed to stretch on forever.

meanings.sent1: She wore her winterly coat to stay warm in the snow.
meanings.sent2: The hot cocoa was the perfect winterly drink.
meanings.sent3: The winterly boots kept her feet dry in the slush.
meanings.sent4: The winterly gloves protected his hands from the biting cold.
meanings.sent5: The winterly scarf completed her cozy winter outfit.

meanings.sent1: The frozen lake had a winterly appearance.
meanings.sent2: The white blanket of snow made everything look winterly.
meanings.sent3: The winterly decorations gave the house a festive feel.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a winterly chill to it.
meanings.sent5: The winterly sky was painted with shades of gray and white clouds.
